officers.name: Gwen Henrich
description: Heya, I'm Gwen! I'm a Biological Anthropology major at Revelle.
I'm not too picky with anime genres, I'll watch anything if its interesting. That being said, some of my favorites are Blue Period, Mob Psycho 100, and The Case Study of Vanitas.

I do also love a fair amount of video games, some of my favorites being The Witcher, Ace Attorney, Hollow Knight, Hades, along with Nintendo franchises and TTRPGs. Outside of that, I also really enjoy gothic and classical literature!
With that being said, I hope you have a great time at AME!

officers.name: Kishen Thevandran
description: Hello everyone! My name is Kishen. I‚Äôm a third year CSE major in Warren and I‚Äôm an international student from Malaysia.
My favorite anime has got to be Bleach (Byakuya my goat) and I‚Äôve also recently finished playing Final Fantasy XVI (which was peak üó£Ô∏è).
Feel free to drop me any questions you may have on Discord.

officers.name: Megan Jun
description: Heyo! I‚Äôm Megan!

I‚Äôm a Literature/Writing major at Marshall. I don‚Äôt watch too much anime, but in the chance that I do, I‚Äôm probably watching a sports anime. I‚Äôm a manga and manwha enthusiast who mainly reads slice of life and comedy and likes looking for underrated manga.
My favorite mangas are ‚ÄúThe Girl From the Other Side‚Äù and ‚ÄúErased‚Äù. Outside of anime, I like to read, write, watch plays/musicals, and draw.
I hope you enjoy your time at AME!

officers.name: Alee Ong
description: Hi hi! I‚Äôm Alee and I‚Äôm a 3rd year Applied Mathematics major at Warren.

My favorite genres in anime and manga are comedy, slice of life, and fantasy. I tend to read more manga than watch anime just because I read very quickly. And I also like to play games but I‚Äôm into mainly JRPGs.
The Atelier series is one of my favorites for how they integrate slice of life with fantasy. But I enjoy other series like Persona, Tales, Rune Factory, Danganronpa, and Fire Emblem.

I also play a lot of gacha games (PAD, Genshin, HSR). I‚Äôm into a lot of niche series (like ORV, TCF, RPG-Maker Horror games, Epithet Erased) so if you ever want to talk about them send me a DM in discord.
I hope you enjoy AME!

officers.name: Aimee Yang
description: Hi! I‚Äôm Aimee, a second year Cognitive Science major at Muir.
My personal genre preferences are slice of life anime and horror manga! In my free time I draw and play (puzzle) visual novels, with Ace Attorney being my current favorite.
I‚Äôm a big fan of K-Pop girl groups (my favorites are IVE, NewJeans, and Twice, but I‚Äôm familiar with basically every popular girl group).
Feel free to DM me if you want to talk about drawing or anything else!

officers.name: Jason Trinh
description: Yo! I‚Äôm Jason and I‚Äôm a second year CogSci major at Marshall College!
I‚Äôm pretty open when it comes to anime, it just takes me a while to get to it lol. My top 3 shows would probably be Violet Evergarden, Mushoku Tensei, and Uma Musume.
I mainly play FPS games and gacha games such as Marvel Rivals and Honkai: Star Rail. Otherwise, my other hobbies include watching YouTube and editing!

officers.name: Vincent Ramilo
description: Oh hi! My name is Vincent and I'm a 1st year CogSci major from Sixth!
I don‚Äôt really watch anime as much as I used to but some of my favorites are JJK, JJBA, AOT, SAO, One Piece, Frieren, Kaguya-Sama, Lycoris Recoil, and Bocchi the Rock!

I also enjoy playing games from shooters to gacha to fighting to rhythm games, such as Overwatch or Marvel Rivals, Honkai: Star Rail, Guilty Gear Strive, and osu! mania. My top 3 favorite games of all time are Super Smash Bros (entire series), Persona 5 Royal, and Team Fortress 2.
Some of my hobbies also involve drawing sketches, editing videos, coding projects, watching VTubers, and listening to music. It's nice to meet you all and I hope everyone has an amazing time at AME!

officers.name: Gio Garnica-Alvarado
description: Yo! I‚Äôm Gio, a Chemistry Major from Warren College.
I'm pretty open to anime, I‚Äôll watch it when I can. My favorites are Dr. Stone, Horimiya, Frieren, Shangri-la Frontier and Assassination Classroom.
I really enjoy Greek mythology and Superheroes, so when I play video games my favorites are Hades 1 & 2, God of War, and Marvel Rivals. I also enjoy some TTRPGs and Musicals.
Hope you enjoy your time in AME!

officers.name: Matthew Nguyen
description: Hello! I'm Matthew Nguyen, a Business Psychology major over in Seventh College!

My favorite shows include JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Code Geass, Kaguya-Sama: Love is War, Fate/anything, and potentially some others (I can never make up my mind). I love video games and tabletop games (TTRPGs and 40k especially!), and I'm more than happy to discuss them with anyone!
Nice to meet you all!

officers.name: Neil Chakravarty
description: Yahallo! My name‚Äôs Neil, I‚Äôm a 2nd year Cognitive Science Major (Spec ML/NC) from 7th college.
I watch anime, my favorites being Re:Zero, Oregairu, and Love Is War.
My hot take is that SAO is mostly a good show, and my main other interests include cooking, playing volleyball, and writing!

officers.name: Alyssa Fernandez
description: Hello!! My name is Alyssa, and I'm a 1st year ESYS: Environmental Chemistry major from Eighth College!

I love to collect Manga and trinkets! ( If you want to know what I collect, lemme know, I'm always down to share).Animewise, I'm down to watch any genre, but some faves are Fruits Basket, One Piece, Ouran, SAO, Haikyuu, Given, Wotakoi, & Dungeon Meshi.
I don't really play video games, but I'm always down to try something new! (However, I love the Zelda BOTW games.) I love to yap, so don‚Äôt be afraid to ask me anything.
I hope to meet everyone at our GBMs and events!

officers.name: Ryan Estanislao
description: Hello! I‚Äôm Ryan, a first-year Computer Science major in Eighth College.
The anime I watch is skewed pretty heavily toward isekai and fantasy shows, my favorites being Seirei Gensouki, Machikado Mazoku, and MagiRevo.
My favorite games, both online and on the board, tend to be strategy related, such as EU4 and Diplomacy. Other than that, I enjoy collecting figures and playing volleyball.
Hope you enjoy your time here and feel free to recommend anime to me!
